item.title: Epistemic meaning and the LLL tune in American English
item.description: Sostarics, T., Cole, J. (2021) Epistemic Meaning and the LLL Tune in American English. Proc. 1st International Conference on Tone and Intonation (TAI), 11-15, doi: 10.21437/TAI.2021-3
